name: The void club 1.8 - early access
description:
A new update, as usual, new A girls and B girls, updated room and mechanics + new side quest!

If you find any bug, tell us we'll try to fix it as soon as possible! You can join our discord and share them in the bugs section : https://discord.gg/H6NMqEf

Here's our patreon if you want to support us:

https://www.patreon.com/Thevoidclub

downloadable version:

http://www.mediafire.com/folder/bq2q8zbiq2wsc/The_void_club_chapters

notice: there might be a short loading time after clicking on new game ;)
